title: Francesca Kentish decided to stop removing her body hair for two months
title_page: Francesca Kentish decided to stop removing her body hair for two months | Daily Mail Online
text:
A London-based writer has decided to let the hair on her legs, armpits and bikini line grow - and has 'no plans to pick up a razor any time soon'.
Francesca Kentish quit the arduous beauty regime last year and has found the natural look 'refreshing'. She hasn't picked up a razor for the past two months.
Ms Kentish also hit out at those who have criticised her decision saying it 'should be no big deal'.

Ms Kentish told Metro that she felt 'a little awkward' during the first two weeks but after a month she became 'strangely proud of my armpit hair'.
'It was the first time it had been longer than a half a centimetre in 10 years,' she told the website. 'It was a visible sign that I wasn’t putting up with b******* conventions any longer.
'I’ve enjoyed not freaking out about getting ingrown hairs on my bikini line any more and no more itchy grow back, with the accompanying red pimples.'
Ms Kentish said she hasn't stopped looking herself and her hygiene hasn't been affected.
